product_name: Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro Front Bike Light
long_description: The Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro front bike light offers a 139 lumen beam to illuminate your path and enhance your visibility for oncoming motorists. Includes high and low power beams and Super Flash(TM) flashing mode; Super Flash mode is highly visible, even in daylight. Optically-advanced lens provides superior beam pattern. QuickCam(TM) mounting bracket accommodates tool-free mounting on handlebar; fits 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars. Includes 2 AA batteries.
short_description: The Planet Bike Blaze 2-Watt Micro front bike light offers a 139 lumen beam to illuminate your path and enhance your visibility for oncoming motorists.
